translation.en: Are you hungry? Your father will be home shortly.
translation.es: ¿Tienes hambre? Tu padre regresará pronto. Me cambiaré,

translation.en: I'll change my clothes.
translation.es: Tu padre regresará pronto. Me cambiaré,

translation.en: - Then keep me company in the kitchen. -
translation.es: y luego acompáñame en la cocina. Bien.

translation.en: - Good morning. - Water...
Water.
- Mom! - I'll be out in a minute.
Be quiet and don't move!
- Ma... - I told you to shut up.
translation.es: - Mamá... - Te dije que te callaras.

translation.en: Please don't hurt us.
- Search the house. - Take what you want and go.
translation.es: Revisa la casa. Llévense lo que quieran.

translation.en: Run, Matias, run!
Isabel!
Zeca!
Help me!
Please, God, help us.
Mrs. Santana, you're fully dilated. We have to deliver the baby.
We have to deliver the baby... Push! You're going to give birth now. Push!
translation.es: El bebé tiene que nacer. ¡Puje! Va a dar a luz. ¡Puje!

translation.en: Mama, it's okay.
- Good afternoon. - Good afternoon, General.
Is my brother inside? Open the gate, please.
Yes, sir, but the commander asked not to be disturbed.
translation.es: Sí, señor, pero el comandante pidió no ser molestado.

translation.en: You have ten seconds to open the gate before this gets ugly. Understand?
translation.es: Tienen diez segundos para abrir o tendrán problemas. ¿Sí?

translation.en: I'm sorry, General.
Dias.
Take him out of here.
- Have you got them? - I'm looking at them, boss.
Nobody steals from me.
Understand, boss.
Kill him.
You speak English?
Good.
You're next.
Unless you can think of something to make me and my friends there... happy.
translation.es: A menos que se te ocurra algo que nos alegre a mí y a mis amigos.

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying?
Whatever they want, whenever they want it.
And then maybe we can forget you and you're boyfriend's stupidity.
translation.es: Entonces, quizá podamos olvidarnos de la estupidez tuya y de tu novio.

translation.en: Go to work.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY, BROTHER!
Dias, where are you?
We have a location. We're ready to move in.
translation.es: Los localizamos. Estamos listos para entrar.

translation.en: You're needed here. Call me.
Matias, I see you and Dias as my sons
translation.es: Matias, Dias y tú son como mis hijos

translation.en: because I was very good friends with your father.
translation.es: porque tu padre y yo fuimos buenos amigos.

translation.en: But... as commander of the police...
translation.es: Pero... como comandante de la policía,

translation.en: it's my duty to act and say your brother's recent behavior is unacceptable.
translation.es: debo actuar y decir que el comportamiento de tu hermano es inaceptable.

translation.en: I'm disappointed. Has he lost his mind?
Dias' heavy drinking, not reporting in for days, relaxing at home,
translation.es: Dias bebe por demás, no aparece durante días, descansa en casa, en vez de venir a trabajar.

translation.en: not getting his ass to work.
translation.es: descansa en casa, en vez de venir a trabajar.

translation.en: All our attempts to help him and it seems our efforts have no results.
translation.es: Hemos intentado todo por ayudarlo y nuestro esfuerzo no da resultado.

translation.en: But... this can't carry on...
not on my watch.
translation.es: No mientras yo esté al mando.

translation.en: I understand, Commander, and I apologize on his behalf.
translation.es: Entiendo, comandante, me disculpo por él.

translation.en: The anniversary of my parents' murder is the same day my brother was born.
translation.es: El aniversario del asesinato de mis padres es el mismo día de su cumpleaños.

translation.en: Birthdays are never easy for him.
translation.es: Cumplir años no es fácil para él.

translation.en: But there is no excuse.
I was going to give you one month's leave as requested.
translation.es: Iba a darte el mes de licencia que solicitaste.

translation.en: I have given this a lot of thought.
I'm assigning you as the DNIC Commander.
translation.es: Te nombro comandante de la DNIC

translation.en: So you can keep him an eye on him.
You will be my eyes and ears on this operation.
translation.es: Serás mis ojos y oídos en esta operación.

translation.en: You and your brother will get this done.
translation.es: Tú y tu hermano resolverán esto.

translation.en: Understood?
Get out.
Hey, Commander Dias Santana is here.
About time. Less we have to deal with that nappy wearin' lieutenant the better.
translation.es: Era hora. Cuanto menos lidiemos con ese teniente cobarde, mejor.

translation.en: I don't think that guy's ever fired a shot in his life.
translation.es: No creo que haya disparado un tiro en su vida.

translation.en: The only shots he fires... are at his wife's ass.
translation.es: Los únicos tiros que lanza van al culo de su mujer.

translation.en: Hey, have some respect.
What's up, boys? What are we talking about? Football again?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal, chicos? ¿De qué hablan? ¿De fútbol otra vez?

translation.en: Sergeant Marco.
Might want to pull that tongue back in your mouth, rookie. Might swallow a fly.
translation.es: Mejor que cierres la boca. Te entrarán moscas.

translation.en: No, I was just... staring.
I know you all missed me, so save your niceties for someone who needs it.
translation.es: Sé que me extrañaron, así que no hace falta que lo digan. Espero que aún estén pensando en nuestra misión porque sucederá.

translation.en: I hope your minds are still fixed on our mission, because it's happening.
translation.es: Espero que aún estén pensando en nuestra misión porque sucederá.

translation.en: Sergeant Qeto, the details.
- Good morning, men. - Good morning, Sergeant.
translation.es: Buenos días, caballeros. Buenos días, sargento.

translation.en: Okay, our mission today is this warehouse in Mutamba.
translation.es: Nuestra misión hoy es en este depósito en Mutamba.

translation.en: We have information
translation.es: Tenemos información de que este complejo

translation.en: that this complex houses one of the biggest drug operations
translation.es: Tenemos información de que este complejo aloja una de las operaciones de drogas más grandes de la ciudad.

translation.en: in the city.
translation.es: aloja una de las operaciones de drogas más grandes de la ciudad.

translation.en: I'm going to pass this over to Agent Orlando,
translation.es: Le doy la palabra al agente Orlando

translation.en: who worked with Sinse Investigations.
translation.es: que trabajó en la investigación con los servicios de inteligencia.

translation.en: Obi Chukwu... Nigerian. He's the ringleader's right hand.
translation.es: Obi Chukwu, nigeriano. Es la mano derecha del jefe.

translation.en: And the big boss?
We don't know his name or who he is. We are calling him Mr. X for now.
translation.es: No lo sabemos. Por ahora, lo llamamos señor X.

translation.en: Maybe his mama never gave him one.
translation.es: Quizá su madre no le puso nombre.

translation.en: Okay, settle down.
General Matias will be leading the operation with Commander Dias.
translation.es: El general Matias liderará la misión con el comandante Dias.

translation.en: - You got that? - Yes, sir!
Commander...
I'd like to be on this mission.
translation.es: me gustaría participar en esta misión.

translation.en: Alright, but don't screw up.
translation.es: De acuerdo, pero no metas la pata.

translation.en: What's your name, agent?
On the streets, Shefor, Dirty Man.
translation.es: En las calles, me llaman Sucio.

translation.en: But it's Roland, my name's Roland.
Well, Shefor... As of now, you're off the street.
translation.es: Bueno, a partir de ahora, sal de la calle.

translation.en: You're mission's over, finito.
You can go back to the UK.
What's the lowdown inside?
There's thirteen men and eight women, a few of them top ranking.
translation.es: Hay 13 hombres, ocho mujeres. Tres son jefes.

translation.en: They've got assault rifles, some battle rifles, AK- 47s and Jerichos.
translation.es: Tienen fusiles de asalto, algunos de combate, algunos AK-47 y Jericho.

translation.en: The women are basically slaves. They never leave.
translation.es: Las mujeres son esclavas, nunca salen.

translation.en: And X?
I don't know. It could be anyone.
translation.es: No lo sé. Podría ser cualquiera.

translation.en: I know they're moving a lot of cash today, so he's got to be here.
translation.es: Sé que hoy moverán mucho efectivo, así que debe estar aquí.

translation.en: Good job, agent.
Take a nice long vacation.
Listen up, Mr. X is most likely here.
translation.es: Es muy probable que el señor X esté aquí.

translation.en: No description...
but... we have Mac 10s, AK47s.
Bring the heavy fire power and let's be smooth about it.
- Understood? - Yes, sir!
I want to thank you for what you did back at your house with the chief...
translation.es: Gracias por lo que hiciste por mí en tu casa

translation.en: and the motorcycle... but I can take it from here.
translation.es: con el jefe, y por la moto,

translation.en: I don't need your brotherly concern or help.
translation.es: pero ahora me hago cargo yo. No necesito tu preocupación de hermano ni tu ayuda.

translation.en: Four years and nothing has changed.
translation.es: Pasaron cuatro años y nada cambió.

translation.en: Commander, as your superior,
I suggest you get with the program if you want to stay a cop.
translation.es: le sugiero que acate las órdenes si quiere seguir siendo policía.

translation.en: Okay, guys, let's lock and load.
General, with your permission, we've got garbage out back that needs removing.
translation.es: General, con su permiso, hay basura que debemos remover.

translation.en: Already on it.
Marco, De Costa. Greenlight, entrance.
Sir, already got them in our cross hairs. Injured, or in a body bag?
translation.es: Señor, ya los tengo en la mira. ¿A matar o herir?

translation.en: Gentleman, people are going to die here today, and it's not going to be one of us.
translation.es: Caballeros, hoy morirá gente, y no seremos nosotros.

translation.en: Bag them.
Shit... Got one heading your way.
translation.es: Carajo. Hay uno viniendo hacia aquí.

translation.en: Reis, deal with that.
Okay, perimeter secure. Breach, breach, breach!
Fuck me, look at this place! Fuckin' mess.
translation.es: Miren este lugar. Es un desastre. ¡Oigan!

translation.en: Hey! It's a fuckin' mess!
translation.es: Es un desastre. ¡Oigan! ¡Esto es un desastre!

translation.en: Everybody, radio in.
Blanco, all good.
Clean room. Quiet.
Beanie, roof secure.
Tito... Tito?
Tito... You better not be asleep, huh?
translation.es: Tito, mejor que no estés durmiendo.

translation.en: Clear out the front, boss.
Ok, now listen. Stay alert.
We have a lot of drugs and money to move today. Stay alert!
translation.es: Hoy tenemos mucha droga y dinero. Mantente alerta.

translation.en: Copy that.
Hey, Ze Maria, don't get cocky about it.
You want to radio him something better? It worked, okay.
I hope so. Let's move.
Deal with this.
Quiet! Not a word.
I'm going to take my hand off your mouth.
translation.es: Voy a sacarte la mano de la boca.

translation.en: Please... don't scream.
You understand?
You'll never get off the shot.
Your call.
Everybody get down!
And shut the fuck up!
Cover me!
You'll live.
You've got friendlies down here!
General Matias, we have a runner heading out of the east wing,
translation.es: General Matias, hay uno corriendo por el ala este,

translation.en: and he's carrying a briefcase. Could be our boy.
translation.es: lleva un maletín. Podría ser nuestro hombre.

translation.en: - Have you got a shot? - No.
Have you got him?
Negative.
Throw it down.
I need your car. Everyone, get out! Everybody, out!
Everyone, shut up or bang bang, understand?
Boss, we got nailed. DNIC and military at Mutamba.
translation.es: Jefe, nos descubrieron. La DNIC y los militares, en Mutamba.

translation.en: What about my fucking drugs and my fucking money?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de mis putas drogas y mi puto dinero?

translation.en: It's gone, all of it. The drugs and money.
translation.es: No quedó nada. Ni drogas ni dinero.

translation.en: Get to the port near the Marginal. I'll organize your pick up.
translation.es: Ve al puerto cerca del Marginal. Pasarán por ti.

translation.en: Go ahead. Run, asshole.
We are flying out today. Get the bag ready.
You've got fifteen minutes.
Sweet talk him. Lie to him. I don't care.
Just get the name of his boss.
translation.es: Pero consigue el nombre de su jefe.

translation.en: You want to be a field agent? Here's your shot.
translation.es: ¿Quieres ser agente? Esta es tu oportunidad.

translation.en: - What the hell is this? - Change of tactics.
translation.es: - ¿Qué rayos es esto? - Cambio de táctica.

translation.en: If I go in, I'm just going to kick his ass, so let the kid have a crack at it.
translation.es: Si entro yo, le rompo la cara, así que le doy una oportunidad a él.

translation.en: Perp's in there.
I hope you know what you're doing.
translation.es: Espero que sepas lo que haces.

translation.en: Good afternoon.
I'm agent Orlando. I'll be asking some answers.
translation.es: Soy el agente Orlando, le responderé unas preguntas...

translation.en: No, I'm asking questions. You're giving answers.
translation.es: No. Yo pregunto, y usted responde.

translation.en: Just for the record, I'm showing the prisoner pictures of wanted criminals.
translation.es: Que quede asentado que le muestro al prisionero fotos de criminales buscados.

translation.en: What can you tell me about this one?
Are you crazy?
You're lucky I don't beat your ass.
translation.es: Tiene suerte de que no le dé una paliza.

translation.en: How many times... have you guys tried to kill Commander Dias...
translation.es: ¿Cuántas veces intentaron matar al comandante Dias?

translation.en: and failed? We are the police.
You know... if the boss had wanted to kill the Santanas,
translation.es: Si el jefe hubiera querido matar a los Santana,

translation.en: he would have done it when he killed your mother and your father.
translation.es: lo habría hecho cuando mató a su madre y a su padre.

translation.en: Or any time since.
You see...
the boss is still upset with the General for putting that scar on his face.
translation.es: el jefe aún está molesto por la cicatriz que le hizo el general.

translation.en: You're still alive because he wants you to be.
translation.es: Ambos siguen vivos porque él quiere que así sea.

translation.en: He should have killed me in my mother's womb.
translation.es: Debió matarme en el vientre de mi madre.

translation.en: Where is your boss?
You will put in the report
that the prisoner tried to reach for your weapon.
translation.es: que el prisionero intentó agarrar tu arma.

translation.en: On the count of ten.
Shoot this asshole.
I swear by my mother's and my father's grave that I will kill you now.
translation.es: O te juro por mi madre y mi padre que te mataré yo ahora.

translation.en: Ten... nine... eight... seven... six...
- Tell them now, Mr. Chukwu. - ...five... four... three... Talk...
translation.es: seis, - Dígales, señor Chukwu. - cinco, cuatro, tres,

translation.en: Okay, okay...
He's probably in South Africa by now.
That is where he does most of his operations,
translation.es: Allí hace muchos de sus negocios.

translation.en: he has people everywhere.
In the police, DNIC, the military. I'm probably a dead man now.
translation.es: En la policía, en la DNIC, en el ejército. Seguro ya soy hombre muerto.

translation.en: What? What?
You think you got me?
No, you never got me. I got you.
translation.es: No. Nunca lo hicieron. Yo los atrapé.

translation.en: His name is Makimba Ferreira.
And he sent me here with a message for you.
translation.es: Me envió aquí con un mensaje para ustedes.

translation.en: He's coming... and you won't even know it.
translation.es: Vendrá... y ustedes no se darán cuenta.

translation.en: We'll get him.
I promise.
- Yeah? - How you doing?
I'm alright.
We're all getting together, remember?
Not really interested in a noisy club.
translation.es: No me interesa ir a un club ruidoso.

translation.en: We have a meeting with the NP Commander tomorrow.
translation.es: Mañana veremos al comandante de la Policía Nacional.

translation.en: We'll get Ferreira.
You should come tonight. It'll be good.
translation.es: Deberías venir esta noche. Te hará bien.

translation.en: Dias...
I don't know what happened between us, but maybe it's happening for a reason.
translation.es: no sé qué sucedió entre nosotros, pero quizá esté pasando por una razón.

translation.en: Okay, if you don't come for me, do it for your men.
translation.es: Si no vienes por mí, ven por tus hombres.

translation.en: Anything else?
No.
Glad you made it. Happy birthday.
translation.es: Me alegra que vinieras. Feliz cumpleaños.

translation.en: Happy birthday!
Cheers!
To a happy birthday!
Turn down the music!
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
Today is my brother's birthday. Well, not today, a few days ago.
translation.es: Hoy es el cumpleaños de mi hermano. Bueno, hoy no, hace unos días.

translation.en: So today I want to wish him a happy birthday with a special song by...
translation.es: Hoy es el cumpleaños de mi hermano. Bueno, hoy no, hace unos días. Por eso quiero desearle feliz cumpleaños con una canción especial

translation.en: Marco and Ze Maria.
- Happy birthday, brother. - Yeah, thanks.
Now enjoy your ass and let me get this place jumping!
Excuse me... Want to dance?
Not tonight.
General Matias, your appointment has arrived.
translation.es: General Matias, su cita ha llegado.

translation.en: Appointment? Damn, I need to get to DNIC this morning. Remind me?
translation.es: ¿Mi cita? Rayos, tengo que ir a la DNIC hoy. ¿Con quién es?

translation.en: Zentex from South Africa. The expiring arms contracts.
translation.es: Zentex de Sudáfrica, los contratos de armas vencidos.

translation.en: Right, send them in.
translation.es: Zentex de Sudáfrica, los contratos de armas vencidos. Claro, hazlos pasar.

translation.en: General Santana.
- Good morning. - Morning.
You enjoy your birthday?
I don't really do birthdays, but yes, it was a good gesture.
translation.es: No suelo celebrar mi cumpleaños, pero fue un lindo gesto.

translation.en: So, what do you do?
I'm a cleaner. I clean the rubbish from the street.
translation.es: Limpio. Limpio la basura de las calles.

translation.en: You're getting ready to leave. Okay, will I see you again?
translation.es: Estás listo para irte. ¿Volveré a verte?

translation.en: No.
I'm sorry.
I shouldn't have done this.
I have to go.
Hello, Mum.
- How are you? - Good.
You look well.
- Who's that? - That's you.
With that big head?
- Oh, I don't know about that. - It's not really big.
translation.es: No lo sé. No es muy grande.

translation.en: I'm gonna have to take this... Excuse me.
You back in Cape Town?
Good. Let's meet.
What bullshit!
Do they actually want to clean up the crime or do they just want to talk about it?
translation.es: ¿De veras quieren acabar con el crimen o solo quieren hablar de eso?

translation.en: Because that sounded like a lot of talk and no action.
translation.es: Hablan mucho, pero no hacen nada.

translation.en: How are we going to get Ferreira in South Africa if we can't go there?
translation.es: ¿Cómo atraparemos a Ferreira si no vamos a Sudáfrica?

translation.en: I don't know what just happened. I'll find out.
translation.es: No sé qué pasó. Voy a averiguarlo.

translation.en: This was supposed to be a strategy meeting to bring Ferreira back.
translation.es: Esta sería una reunión de estrategia para traer a Ferreira de regreso.

translation.en: Then someone got to them.
And what does that tell you about them, the ones you want to be like?
translation.es: ¿Y qué te dice eso de estos tipos? Esos tipos a quienes tanto admiras y respetas.

translation.en: I'm done. From now on, I'll do things my own way if I have to.
translation.es: Se terminó. De ahora en más, haré las cosas a mi manera.

translation.en: Walk with me.
I find walking keeps the energy moving.
translation.es: Para mí, caminar hace que la energía siga moviéndose.

translation.en: It's less awkward.
And I assume this is an awkward moment,
translation.es: Y este es un momento incómodo,

translation.en: you having lost two million dollars of my money?
translation.es: dado que perdiste dos millones de dólares que eran míos.

translation.en: It's not like we are in the furniture business.
translation.es: No estamos en el negocio de muebles.

translation.en: We have risks.
Which is your area of expertise, what you're paid to mitigate.
translation.es: En eso te especializas tú, cobras por minimizarlos.

translation.en: Can I presume the police were involved in the loss of my two million?
translation.es: Supongo que la policía tuvo que ver con la pérdida de mis dos millones.

translation.en: I'll deal with it. A cop. We go back many years.
translation.es: Yo me encargaré. Un policía que conozco hace mucho.

translation.en: - He may be coming here. - No, he won't.
translation.es: - Quizá venga... - No, no lo hará.

translation.en: And don't deal with it. I can live with the two million.
translation.es: Y no te encargues. Acepto esa pérdida.

translation.en: But dealing with an officer of the law...
translation.es: Pero tratar con un oficial de la ley podría causar mayores pérdidas

translation.en: It could cause greater losses I won't be so willing to walk away from.
translation.es: Pero tratar con un oficial de la ley podría causar mayores pérdidas que no estoy dispuesto a sufrir.

translation.en: It's central Africa. It's practically synonymous with corruption.
translation.es: Es África Central. Es casi sinónimo de corrupción.

translation.en: Now find a way...
and ensure that my operations aren't put in jeopardy in the future.
translation.es: y asegúrate de que mis operaciones no corran riesgo en el futuro.

translation.en: Does that make sense?
- Yes? - Yes.
Good.
It's a beautiful day.
Enjoy it.
I'm sorry I'm late.
No, the dedicated general keeping people safe.
translation.es: El dedicado general que mantiene a la gente a salvo.

translation.en: No need to apologize. Thank you.
Sorry about the other night.
Sorry for what?
Unless you're here to arrest me, or need me professionally, Commander...
translation.es: A menos que haya venido a arrestarme o me necesite profesionalmente,

translation.en: I'm going for a swim.
I've enjoyed this more than I have in a long time.
translation.es: Hace tiempo que no me divertía tanto.

translation.en: Me too.
You know I'm afraid of the ocean, ever since I was a boy.
translation.es: Le temo al océano desde que era niño.

translation.en: And here you are in the middle of the ocean. Should I be impressed?
translation.es: Y aquí estás, en medio del océano. ¿Debo estar impresionada?

translation.en: Are you?
I'm hanging out with some of the boys in The Borough tonight.
translation.es: Esta noche saldré con unos chicos del vecindario.

translation.en: That's our spot. You should come down and join us.
translation.es: Es nuestro lugar. Deberías venir con nosotros.

translation.en: - Pretty please, sir? - Maybe.
Maybe?
Okay.
Come. I want to show you something.
My father lived here with my grandparents before they moved to the city.
translation.es: Mi padre vivió aquí con mis abuelos antes de mudarse a la ciudad.

translation.en: I was six, but I still remember visiting during the war.
translation.es: Yo tenía seis años, pero aún recuerdo haber venido durante la guerra.

translation.en: My father said... I need to protect the family when he was gone.
translation.es: Mi padre decía... que yo debía proteger a la familia cuando él no estuviera.

translation.en: After they were killed...
I was taken to live with a family in Cunene.
translation.es: me llevaron a vivir con una familia en Cunene.

translation.en: Dias was not so fortunate.
We've never been close.
Fuck it. Why not?
Evening, gents.
Relax.
Cold beer, please.
Good to see you're out. Any word on Ferreira?
translation.es: Qué bueno verte aquí. ¿Alguna novedad sobre Ferreira?

translation.en: I know where he lives. He's not exactly keeping a low profile.
translation.es: Sé dónde vive. No mantiene un perfil bajo.

translation.en: I also found out about the tragedy he brought to your family.
translation.es: Además, descubrí la tragedia que causó en tu familia.

translation.en: No need to get into that.
translation.es: No hace falta hablar de eso.

translation.en: - Keep me informed. - I will.
- Have fun tonight, okay? That's an order. - Okay.
translation.es: Diviértete esta noche, ¿sí? Es una orden. De acuerdo.

translation.en: That is my father and my mother. I was six then.
translation.es: Esos son mi padre y mi madre. Yo tenía seis años entonces.

translation.en: Teach me how to kizomba. I've always wanted to learn.
Is this how you live a little?
Sitting alone?
- I'm not good with people. - At least that was honest.
translation.es: No soy muy sociable. Al menos eso fue sincero.

translation.en: If you go after Ferreira in South Africa, I'd like to be in on it.
translation.es: Si vas por Ferreira a Sudáfrica, yo también quiero ir.

translation.en: Orlando's not the only one who knows how to get information.
translation.es: Orlando no es el único que sabe cómo obtener información.

translation.en: I'm sorry about your mother and father.
It's not hard to figure out you're going after him.
translation.es: No es difícil ver por qué vas tras él.

translation.en: I could be an asset.
A man and woman traveling together as a couple attracts less attention.
translation.es: Un hombre y una mujer que viajan juntos llaman menos la atención.

translation.en: Think about it.
Kizomba is personal.
translation.es: La kizomba es un baile íntimo.

translation.en: You must surrender... give in...
and let the man... guide you.
translation.es: Y dejar que el hombre... te guíe.

translation.en: I'll see you all Monday.
If you find anything else, let me know.
Alright, take care.
Open it!
- You know how to use a gun? - I've never tried.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes cómo usar un arma? - Nunca lo intenté.

translation.en: You sell weapons and you don't know how to use one?
translation.es: ¿Vendes armas y no sabes cómo usarlas?

translation.en: If anyone comes through this door, you just point and pull the trigger.
translation.es: Si alguien entra por la puerta, apunta y presiona el gatillo.

translation.en: - And if it's you? - You don't shoot.
Where is he?
- - Shit!
Lesson one: Take the kill when you can!
Second lesson: Shut up and shoot.
- Are you alone? - Give me a gun.
- Excuse me one moment. - Of course.
- What are you doing here? - We need to talk, minister.
Right now.
He's the main guy, the head of it all.
translation.es: Este es el principal, el cabecilla.

translation.en: Cut off the head and we stop the biggest drug operation
translation.es: Si acabamos con el cabecilla, podemos terminar con la mayor operación de drogas en Angola y África Central.

translation.en: in Angola and Central Africa.
translation.es: podemos terminar con la mayor operación de drogas en Angola y África Central.

translation.en: And the murders that go with it.
translation.es: Y con todos los asesinos involucrados.

translation.en: He killed three of my men tonight. Men with families.
translation.es: Mató a tres de mis hombres esta noche, hombres con familia.

translation.en: And three of mine. They spoke English. They're not even from here.
translation.es: Y tres de los míos. Hablaban inglés, ni siquiera son de aquí.

translation.en: We know where he is in South Africa.
Send the two of us and a small group of agents under cover.
Ask the Deputy Minister and Commissioner Martins to come in.
translation.es: Pídeles al viceministro y al comisionado Martins que vengan.

translation.en: As much as I would like to think so, I'm not the only voice here.
translation.es: No soy el único que decide.

translation.en: What you're asking
translation.es: Lo que piden solo puede hacerse si lo capturan

translation.en: can only be done if he can be captured or eliminated discreetly.
translation.es: Lo que piden solo puede hacerse si lo capturan o eliminan con discreción.

translation.en: I can't allow the two of you to cause problems between South Africa and Angola.
translation.es: No puedo permitir que los dos causen problemas entre Sudáfrica y Angola.

translation.en: You are my best men...
but the country comes first.
Gentlemen...
We have a sensitive issue, which I know I can rely upon you to assist with.
translation.es: Señores, tenemos un tema sensible, y sé que ustedes pueden ayudarme a resolverlo.

translation.en: We need diplomatic visas to South Africa.
And I assume untraceable weapons?
Sir, do you know what you're asking?
translation.es: Señor, ¿sabe lo que nos está pidiendo?

translation.en: Yes, I do. I'm doing it for the defense of this country.
translation.es: Sí. Lo hago para defender a este país.

translation.en: Consider it done. Shouldn't be a problem.
I don't need to tell you not to speak to anyone.
translation.es: No necesito decirles que no pueden hablar con nadie.

translation.en: Unfortunately, confidential information in the NP
translation.es: Lamentablemente, en la Policía Nacional, la información confidencial

translation.en: seems to get bought and sold like milk.
translation.es: Lamentablemente, en la Policía Nacional, la información confidencial es moneda de cambio.

translation.en: They definitely have someone on the inside.
We can't trust anyone.
I assume my actions have met with your satisfaction?
translation.es: Mis acciones habrán satisfecho sus expectativas.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
He's checking you for a wire.
translation.es: Se fija si tienes un micrófono.

translation.en: I'm curious...
Was it something in my words...
my tone... my demeanor...
that perhaps suggested to you that I speak simply to hear the sound of my own voice?
translation.es: quizá te sugirió que hablo solo para oírme a mí mismo.

translation.en: I know people cursed with that malady.
translation.es: Conozco gente que padece esa enfermedad.

translation.en: They open their mouths but what comes out... are just empty words.
translation.es: Abren la boca, sale una palabra y es solo una palabra vacía.

translation.en: Devoid of thought or meaning.
I don't expect an answer as...
I had assumed I had made it perfectly clear regarding the policemen
translation.es: supuse que había dejado bien en claro que no quería que tocaras a los policías.

translation.en: that I specifically asked you not to touch.
translation.es: que no quería que tocaras a los policías.

translation.en: I do business in several countries
and employ many people who perform the same responsibilities as yours.
translation.es: Tengo muchos empleados que tienen las mismas responsabilidades que tú.

translation.en: If you feel the need again
translation.es: Si vuelves a sentir la necesidad

translation.en: to put me, my business and my family at risk,
translation.es: de ponerme a mí, mi negocio y mi familia en peligro...

translation.en: I will not hesitate to make an example of you to others in my employ.
translation.es: no dudaré en usarte como ejemplo para mis otros empleados...

translation.en: In the most horrendous way possible.
translation.es: de la manera más horrenda que exista.

translation.en: Does that make sense?
Does it?
Yeah, walk away, asshole.
Go stick your fucking head in a hole and maybe it'll all go away.
translation.es: Ve a meter la cabeza en un agujero y quizá todo pase.

translation.en: God damn it!
Are you insane? He's from the president's office.
translation.es: ¿Estás loco? Es de la oficina del presidente.

translation.en: So what?
Let him fire me.
Hell, I'll hand in my resignation if this is the best we can do.
translation.es: Carajo, entregaré mi renuncia si eso es lo mejor que podemos hacer.

translation.en: I'm sorry, General.
Thandi, what are you doing here?
I was there too last night and it wasn't just the two of you he tried to kill.
translation.es: Yo también estuve allí anoche, y no intentó matarlos solo a ustedes dos.

translation.en: You owe her. Tell her we don't actually arrest criminals in Africa.
translation.es: Se lo debes. Dile que en África de hecho no arrestamos a los delincuentes.

translation.en: - I have contacts in South Africa. - No.
I live there.
So how difficult do you think it will be for him
translation.es: ¿Qué tan difícil crees que le resultará

translation.en: to figure out who I am and where I live?
translation.es: averiguar quién soy y dónde vivo? Puedo ayudar a atraparlo.

translation.en: - I can help you get him. - Can you get weapons?
translation.es: averiguar quién soy y dónde vivo? Puedo ayudar a atraparlo. - ¿Puedes conseguir armas? - Y más.

translation.en: - And more. - You're both crazy!
You want to spend the rest of your life in prison?
translation.es: ¿Quieres pasar el resto de tu vida en prisión?

translation.en: Do you and Thandi want to spend your life looking over your shoulders?
translation.es: ¿Y ustedes quieren pasar el resto de sus vidas en vilo?

translation.en: Because he's not going to stop until we're all dead. You know that, Matias.
translation.es: Porque no se detendrá hasta matarnos a todos. Lo sabes, Matias.

translation.en: Wake up, Matias.
You're living in a fucking fairytale if you think the law is going to protect us.
translation.es: Vives en un cuento de hadas si crees que la ley va a protegernos.

translation.en: Dias fucking Santana, boof!
And his brother, boof!
And maybe a Scot next!
Get me a light.
I don't smoke.
You don't smoke.
Who fucking asked you if you smoke!
My guys can't even kill two simple Angolan cops
translation.es: ¡Mis hombres no pueden matar a dos simples policías angoleños

translation.en: from Cunene, Endivja.
Where the great king, Mandume...
laid with his balls! In the bush!
translation.es: yació con sus bolas en los arbustos!

translation.en: Turn the fucking music off!
This is the other witch, boss.
translation.es: Esta es la otra bruja, jefe.

translation.en: This is the witch? Ha!
Are you guys crazy?
Are you just playing with me?
This... is the witch that was chased away from Angola?
translation.es: ¿Esta es la bruja que echaron de Angola?

translation.en: She doesn't look like a witch.
She doesn't even smell like a witch.
You're good...
Very good.
I want Dias Santana dead!
Dias Santana has a very strong spirit.
translation.es: Dias Santana tiene un espíritu muy fuerte.

translation.en: You must put this necklace on him.
And then you need to cut off his head and eat his heart.
translation.es: y luego cortarle la cabeza y comerte su corazón.

translation.en: I will bring him the demon of the deep forest
translation.es: Le traeré el demonio de la profundidad del bosque

translation.en: and the evil Brusharia, the dark spirit of Kabinda.
translation.es: y la malvada bruxaria, el espíritu oscuro de Cabinda.

translation.en: With this, he won't be able to stop it, or you.
translation.es: Con esto, él no podrá detener eso ni a ti.

translation.en: There's just one thing...
What?
I want my money first.
Okay, you will get your money.
And I get Santana!
Hello. Thank you for taking my call.
translation.es: Hola. Gracias por aceptar mi llamada.

translation.en: - That matter we discussed? - Yes?
Our mutual friend has decided on an early retirement.
translation.es: Nuestro amigo en común ha decidido retirarse antes.

translation.en: I agree.
Life is about choices. Thank you for your understanding.
translation.es: La vida se trata de elecciones. Gracias por comprender.

translation.en: Evening, gentlemen. I know I'm the last person you wanted to see.
translation.es: Buenas noches, caballeros. Soy la última persona que quieren ver.

translation.en: I know you don't have much time.
translation.es: Sé que no tienen mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I'm not here to stop you.
The man you're after is hosting a party tomorrow night.
translation.es: El hombre que buscan dará una fiesta mañana por la noche.

translation.en: Apparently intended to celebrate...
your demise.
I hear you've been put on the invitation list.
translation.es: Están en la lista de invitados.

translation.en: The Angolan government will denounce any non- sanctioned actions.
translation.es: El Gobierno angoleño denunciará cualquier acción no autorizada.

translation.en: You're on your own.
- So we get this guy, right? -
Yeah, we get him. And we get our lives back.
translation.es: Sí, lo atraparemos. Y recuperamos nuestras vidas.

translation.en: You alright? What's the matter?
I'll be fine.
I have just had the best news I've heard all week!
translation.es: Acabo de recibir las mejores noticias de la semana.

translation.en: Some of my old acquaintances from Angola are coming to my party tomorrow night.
translation.es: Unos viejos conocidos de Angola vendrán a mi fiesta mañana.

translation.en: I feel like celebrating.
Who should I celebrate with?
You, you
and... you.
Don't worry, they are with me.
Any more surprises?
- Thank you. - Thank you for what?
Letting me help. And for coming here.
translation.es: Por dejarme ayudar. Y venir aquí.

translation.en: I should have my head examined.
At least with me I know you are safe.
translation.es: Al menos, conmigo sé que estás a salvo.

translation.en: Eh, you look like Elvis!
- Thank you. - You're late.
Yeah, uh, traffic.
- Sorry. - Right.
Something else?
Yeah. No. Uh...
- - R5 assault rifles. 5.56 caliber.
Standard- issue police assault rifle.
Very reliable, based on the Israeli Galil.
translation.es: Este Galil israelí es muy confiable.

translation.en: Fourth gen Glock 17.
Not my favorite. Nine- mil Para, eighteen round mag.
translation.es: No es mi preferida, calibre 9 mm, cargador de 18 cartuchos.

translation.en: - Pass me the sniper, Thandi. - Here.
Now, if you're looking for something to cover some distance,
translation.es: Si buscan algo para cubrir una distancia,

translation.en: we have this custom Enfield sniper.
translation.es: tenemos este fusil M4 a medida.

translation.en: Re- chambered to a 308.
Built- in silencer, high- powered scope... extremely compact.
translation.es: Silenciador incorporado, mira telescópica, extremadamente compacto.

translation.en: With all of this, can't say I wish I was going with you.
translation.es: Con todo esto, no diría que desearía ir con ustedes.

translation.en: Thank you, Amanda.
Good luck.
We take Ferreira dead or alive. Any objections?
translation.es: Atrapamos a Ferreira vivo o muerto. ¿Alguna objeción?

translation.en: Alive if possible.
How likely is that with an army of gangsters around him?
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo lograremos si está rodeado de gánsteres?

translation.en: If capturing him is on the agenda, then yes...
we'll kill him if we have to, but we're not here as assassins.
translation.es: Lo mataremos si hace falta, pero no vinimos como asesinos.

translation.en: Are you okay?
Yeah, just... just tired, I guess.
translation.es: Sí, solo... Solo estoy cansado, supongo.

translation.en: I'm going to get some air.
I'll keep an eye on him.
Something is not right here.
It started back in Angola.
Okay, let's do this!
What's happened?
He started shouting, then passed out.
translation.es: Comenzó a gritar y luego se desmayó.

translation.en: That's it. We need to abort.
We need to get him a doctor.
No, no doctor can help me.
It's black magic.
Dias, what are you talking about?
I heard Ferreira uses witches to take down his enemies.
translation.es: Oí que Ferreira usa brujas para acabar con sus enemigos.

translation.en: Black magic...
It's over.
I'm in command here. You are not fit to carry on.
translation.es: Yo estoy al mando. No puedes continuar.

translation.en: You can't tell me what to do.
You lost that right a long time ago.
I knew this would happen. You'd blame me.
translation.es: Sabía que esto pasaría, que me culparías a mí.

translation.en: I was six years old, goddamn it!
I blame you for a lot of things...
your rich family in Cunene, while I went from one shitty orphanage to the next.
translation.es: Tu familia rica en Cunene, mientras yo pasaba de un orfanato de mierda a otro.

translation.en: Even when you came back to Luanda, where were you?
I lived on the streets and had to fight to survive.
translation.es: Yo vivía en las calles y tenía que pelear para sobrevivir.

translation.en: Yeah, I got into trouble with the people I ran with,
translation.es: Sí, me metí en problemas con mi gente,

translation.en: but they were more family to me than you ever were.
translation.es: pero ¡ellos fueron mi familia más que tú!

translation.en: I kept coming back for you, but you were always so difficult.
translation.es: Siempre te busqué, pero tú eras muy difícil.

translation.en: And that family took care of me like I was their own.
translation.es: Y esa familia me cuidó como si fuera su propio hijo.

translation.en: You never wanted to listen, you still don't listen.
You're stuck in the past where you've always been.
You might as well have been buried with your parents.
translation.es: Bien podrías haber sido enterrado con nuestros padres.

translation.en: At least you'd feel right at home. You hear, you idiot?
translation.es: Al menos así te sentirías en casa. ¿Me oyes, idiota?

translation.en: - You arrogant son of a bitch! - Hey!
Sorry, guys! We ain't got time for this shit.
translation.es: Lo siento, muchachos. No hay tiempo para esta mierda.

translation.en: Landlord's not going to like that.
translation.es: Al dueño no le gustará eso.

translation.en: Does it rain in Cape Town?
I didn't know you felt like that, brother.
translation.es: No sabía que te sentías así, hermano.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
- I'm sorry. - Yeah, me too.
Are we going to do this?
Let's split up. Thandi.
Orlando, where are you?
I'm out back, on my way.
Orlando, we need to hurry this up. Ferreira may be arriving any moment now.
translation.es: Orlando, apurémonos. Ferreira está por llegar.

translation.en: I'm coming...
Nearly there.
Matias, we're coming out. Orlando has your weapon.
translation.es: Matias, vamos en camino. Orlando tiene tu arma.

translation.en: - Wait here. - Okay.
I'll cover the entrance. You get to the main floor.
translation.es: Cubriré la entrada. Tú ve a la pista de baile principal.

translation.en: Thandi, it's time for you to go.
translation.es: Thandi, es hora de que te vayas.

translation.en: Thandi, look at the guard.
What are you two doing here?
We were enjoying a little privacy.
translation.es: Disfrutamos de un poco de privacidad.

translation.en: Lift up your arms.
- I can explain. - You better.
Hello, everybody!
Welcome to my party!
Look! All I want is for you guys to have some real good fun!
translation.es: ¡Mi único deseo es que se diviertan de verdad!

translation.en: But if things start getting interesting,
translation.es: Pero si las cosas se ponen interesantes,

translation.en: please, come get me!
Mr. DJ, hit it!
- I have eyes on Ferreira. - Do you have a clear shot at him?
There's too many people.
If he comes this way, he's mine.
translation.es: Si viene hacia aquí, es mío.

translation.en: Orlando, blend in.
Oh, yes, sir.
Breach! Breach! There's been a breach.
Woman in a black dress, man in a white jacket!
translation.es: Una mujer con vestido negro, un hombre de saco blanco.

translation.en: We've been found out. Time for plan B. Things just got crazy out here.
translation.es: Nos descubrieron. Es hora del plan B, las cosas se descontrolaron.

translation.en: Orlando, get us a ride out of here.
Hold it there. What is the problem?
Yeah, we've got a suspicious male...
- I've got wheels. - Hold tight.
We have to get out of here.
translation.es: Tenemos que salir de aquí. Ve con Orlando.

translation.en: Get to Orlando. Set up to give us cover, we're going to need it.
translation.es: Tenemos que salir de aquí. Ve con Orlando. Prepárense para cubrirnos. Lo necesitaremos.

translation.en: Watch your back.
- Are they here? - Yeah, and we have to take them out now.
translation.es: - ¿Están aquí? - Sí. Y tendremos que eliminarlos ahora. Este juego suyo.

translation.en: This game you're playing... They've taken down three of our guys.
translation.es: Y tendremos que eliminarlos ahora. Este juego suyo. Eliminaron a tres de los nuestros.

translation.en: Four.
They don't leave here.
This party is a celebration for our good Commander's untimely demise.
translation.es: Esta fiesta es para celebrar la muerte prematura de nuestro buen comandante.

translation.en: So it shall be.
So it shall be!
Where's Celia?
I sent her to the car. She should have passed you.
translation.es: La envié al auto. Debiste verla.

translation.en: We have to abort, and she didn't pass here.
translation.es: Debemos abortar. Ella no pasó por aquí.

translation.en: I can't leave her here. You go. I'll finish this myself. I'll find her...
translation.es: No puedo dejarla aquí. Vete. Terminaré esto por mi cuenta. La encontraré y atraparé a Ferreira.

translation.en: and get Ferreira.
translation.es: La encontraré y atraparé a Ferreira.

translation.en: Orlando, any word on Celia?
Dias.
Matias, you go, I'll handle this.
Let her go.
I'm Dias Santana. The one your boss wants.
translation.es: Soy Dias Santana. - El que su jefe busca. - Suelta el arma.

translation.en: Drop your weapon.
translation.es: - El que su jefe busca. - Suelta el arma.

translation.en: Really?
You should have gone.
Put down your gun.
Or they're both dead in three seconds.
translation.es: O ambos morirán en tres segundos.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
Drop your weapons. Turn around and put your hands on your heads.
translation.es: Suelten sus armas, dense vuelta y pongan las manos sobre la cabeza.

translation.en: Orlando, get out of here. Get to Thandi and go.
translation.es: Orlando, sal de aquí. Encuentra a Thandi y váyanse.

translation.en: Where are we?
I'll tell you... when I find out.
translation.es: Cuando lo sepa, te lo diré.

translation.en: Hold on, brother. Hold on.
Where's Celia?
Celia...
I don't know. We have to find a way out of here.
translation.es: No lo sé. Hay que salir de aquí.

translation.en: Gentlemen...
So you actually thought you could just prance in here and, what... arrest me?
translation.es: ¿De verdad pensaron que podían venir aquí y arrestarme?

translation.en: Very heroic.
Now both of you are going to die like dogs.
translation.es: Ahora los dos morirán como perros.

translation.en: That's no way for heroes to die.
translation.es: Así no es como mueren los héroes.

translation.en: Tell me... What's it like...
to finally meet the man that killed your mother... and father?
translation.es: finalmente conocer al hombre que mató a tu madre y a tu padre?

translation.en: But, of course...
we've met before,
you and I.
Shit!
Why don't you let my brother and Celia go?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no liberas a mi hermano y a Celia?

translation.en: Funny you should mention Agent Celia.
translation.es: Qué curioso que menciones a la agente Celia.

translation.en: Celia...
I tried to warn Dias, but he couldn't leave it alone.
translation.es: Intenté advertirle a Dias, pero no pudo resignarse.

translation.en: You bitch!
Why did you do this, money?
Money?
Ferreira is my uncle...
and I've worked for him since day one,
translation.es: y trabajo con él desde siempre.

translation.en: and when you and your brother disappear,
translation.es: Y cuando tú y tu hermano desaparezcan, regresaré y seguiré trabajando para él.

translation.en: I'll go back and I'll keep working for him and maybe one day head up DNIC.
translation.es: Y cuando tú y tu hermano desaparezcan, regresaré y seguiré trabajando para él. Y quizá algún día dirija la DNIC.

translation.en: They will discover and then nail your ass.
- I hope you enjoy this, uncle. - The demon spirits have got him.
translation.es: Espero que lo disfrutes, tío. Los espíritus demoníacos lo tienen.

translation.en: Very powerful.
No!
You're lucky I didn't put a bullet in your head all those years ago.
translation.es: Tienes suerte de que no te haya metido una bala en la cabeza en ese entonces.

translation.en: Now you can pay for my scar.
Cut both their heads off and send them to DNIC.
translation.es: Córtales la cabeza y envíalas a la DNIC.

translation.en: Bring his heart to me.
No one fucks with me. No one!
I waited 35 years for this.
To be honest, I'm not satisfied.
Time to leave.
I'm tired. I'm bored.
Cut me loose and I won't let him kill you.
translation.es: Suéltame y no dejaré que él te mate.

translation.en: - You're a real funny bloke. - Dias.
Let's see how funny it is when I skin your brother alive.
translation.es: Veamos lo gracioso de despellejar a tu hermano.

translation.en: Dias, wake up, brother.
Dias...
Dias...
Dias...
Motherfucker!
Get my car.
Get us out of here.
Drive! Drive!
Take care of my brother. Get him to the hospital.
translation.es: Cuida a mi hermano. Llévalo al hospital.

translation.en: I'll get Ferreira and Celia. She's the mole. Give me the car keys.
translation.es: Yo iré por Ferreira y Celia. Ella es la infiltrada.

translation.en: Celia?
Damn, she was so hot.
No hospital. Don't lose sight of Dias.
translation.es: Nada de hospitales. Vamos tras Dias.

translation.en: Orlando, stop here.
Get Dias.
I should shoot you dead, here and now...
translation.es: Debería matarte aquí mismo, pero no soy como tú.

translation.en: but I'm not you. You're just going to have to rot in prison.
translation.es: Debería matarte aquí mismo, pero no soy como tú. Te pudrirás en la cárcel.

translation.en: You should have killed me when you had the chance.
Dias.
Mr. Mackie, sir. The visitors are here, from Ghana.
translation.es: Señor Mackie, sus invitados de Ghana están aquí.

translation.en: Thanks, Robert.
- What's Ghana, Daddy? - The land of milk and honey, sweetheart.
translation.es: ¿Qué es Ghana, papá? La tierra de la leche y la miel, querida.

translation.en: Land of milk and honey.
translation.es: La tierra de la leche y la miel.

translation.en: You okay?
- Santana. - Did you kill him?
You're going to die, Dias Santana.
Who is this?
You killed my brother, Ferreira... and now I'm going to kill you.
translation.es: Mataste a mi hermano Ferreira, y ahora te mataré a ti.
